name: Simon Game (fermingimpel)
description:
Simon Game What is Simon Game

Simon is a game created by Ralph Baer & Howard J. Morrison.

In this game, you need to see and hear the order of sounds and lights than appear, and when it finish, you need to repeat in order clicking in the buttons

This proyect was made in C++ using Raylib
Images made with Photoshop
Sounds made with BeepBox

Controls

You only need to click everything!
